channel.title: Enternal Legacy
channel.description:
[b][u]Enternal Legacy game developers[/u][/b]
[hr] [i]This isn't a game website about games to do with xbox 360's or ps3's and stuff like that. It's own programmed fps and mmorpg's that wev'e worked on for 2 years now. It's not spoon fed like private servers where you got it straight infront of you, the movements, the colours, weapons, places and all the rest of it.[/i] [hr]
Our main game series were working on at the moment is Externoz.
[b]Externoz-[/b] [b]Fps[/b] [b]Externoz revolution-[/b] [b]Fps[/b] [b]Externoz legacy-[/b] [b]Mmorpg[/b]
Were also working on an arcade website called SF-games where our 2d mmorpg's are in construction. We need members to get [b]Enternal Legacy[/b] going so joining the community would help a lot. It's run by two people, me 0wn7g3 and Slim Fly. When we get into bigger developments we might need some more people but it's much more complex than programming a P server.
[hr] [b][u]Website-[/u][/b] www.Enternallegacy.biz.ly [hr] [b][u]Forums-[/u][/b] www.Externozrpg.ulmb.com [hr]
Externoz is released on April 1st so we need people to join :D

item.title: Enternal Legacy
item.dc:creator: @p0unding p0unding
item.description:
@p0unding wrote:

Enternal Legacy game developers

[hr]
This isn’t a game website about games to do with xbox 360’s or ps3’s and stuff like that. It’s own programmed fps and mmorpg’s that wev’e worked on for 2 years now. It’s not spoon fed like private servers where you got it straight infront of you, the movements, the colours, weapons, places and all the rest of it.
[hr]

Our main game series were working on at the moment is Externoz.

Externoz- Fps
Externoz revolution- Fps
Externoz legacy- Mmorpg

Were also working on an arcade website called SF-games where our 2d mmorpg’s are in construction. We need members to get Enternal Legacy going so joining the community would help a lot. It’s run by two people, me 0wn7g3 and Slim Fly. When we get into bigger developments we might need some more people but it’s much more complex than programming a P server.

[hr]
Website- www.Enternallegacy.biz.ly
[hr]
Forums- www.Externozrpg.ulmb.com
[hr]

Externoz is released on April 1st so we need people to join
